name: Teen With Hero Photos Demanding Attention

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"We've got a kid at the front desk—maybe 12 years old—claiming he has photos of heroes in their civilian identities. Says he'll post them online unless he gets a 'ride-along' on a real mission. He seems harmless but determined. And he's got a LOT of Instagram followers."

Requirements

  • Assess if his photos are legitimate threats
  • Talk him down without making promises you can't keep
  • Figure out how he got those photos in the first place
